pageContext.claim: “I also formed the PREVENTS Task Force to fight the tragedy of veteran suicide, which is an unbelievable tragedy. And we actually have medications that we're working on. They have one from Johnson & Johnson, which is a inhaler, and it has been very effective. We've ordered, I think, thousands of units of that -- thousands and thousands -- and we're using it.”
pageContext.analysis: Spravato, which was developed by Johnson & Johnson, was seen as a controversial, as some had questions about it’s effectiveness. Moreover, the “thousands” seem not to being used. Stat News reported only 15 veterans had been treated with the drug.
